comments.body: This is added because we have too many optional params for `sendMessage`: partition, headers, timestamp. KafkaTestUtils still provides some convenient overloaded methods for sendMessage(s), but the case where headers and/or timestamp are used will be covered via this builder.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,74 @@

+
+import java.lang.{Integer => JInt, Long => JLong}
+

+import org.apache.kafka.common.header.internals.RecordHeader
+
+class RecordBuilder(topic: String, value: String) {
